title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\Sentiment
name: Sentiment
description:
The sentiment, such as positive/negative feeling or association, for a unit of analysis, such as the query text.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Sentiment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.magnitude
params.description: A non-negative number in the [0, +inf) range, which represents the absolute magnitude of sentiment, regardless of score (positive or negative).

methods.name: getScore
methods.description:
Sentiment score between -1.0 (negative sentiment) and 1.0 (positive sentiment).

Generated from protobuf field float score = 1;
